channel.title: Server Crashes?!?
channel.description:
Ok, My server is running perfectly fine until I click on the bank. when I click on it the game just freezes but the characters and npcs still move a bit and I cannot click to run anywhere then after about 5 seconds I get disconnected? why?? How can I fix this? Here is what it said in the cmd.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/T1NJU.jpg[/img] - Source [img]http://i.imgur.com/JQcga.jpg[/img] - Client
